Reviews.Title: Old School phone but has a nice slick look
Reviews.Author: Alii
Reviews.Content: Its impossible to find a basic phone without a data plan anymore, so this was a good find.  I love the look of it it is unbelievably light and very thin, so it doesnt look like an old phone.  My only complaint was that the text messages cannot be organized based on the contact name, your texts just go into and inbox and outbox folder, with all of your text convos mixed up.  Another issue I had was that the phone was not receiving incoming calls.  So I called verizon and after ten minutes it was fixed.  Basically they had me reprogram it making sure that my old phone was completely turned off because sometimes if you leave your old phone on it messes up the activation.  Overall i'm happy with this phone, its old school but looks real modern.

Reviews.Title: Cool phone, horrible battery
Reviews.Author: squirreljuice
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone. I love slider phones and this one i had owned previously, so i decided i would try it again. I forgot just how badly the battery life sucked. I literally cannot go more than 16 hours on a charge with light use of about 5 text messages a day. If you are willing to carry a charger around with you everywhere, then this is an awesome phone. The phone itself is pretty quick. Its no smartphone but it can get the job done. The thing that takes the longest to load is the videos menu. If it had a better battery life it would have a 5 star rating, but the battery life killed it for me and i went back to my LG Cosmos (which is a horrible phone but has way better batter life). I wish the EnV 1 wasn't so expensive or i would get another one of those.

Reviews.Title: oldie but goodie
Reviews.Author: REBECCA
Reviews.Content: This phone was used but appeared almost new. i was very happy with this phone and i would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: OLD SCHOOL BUT STILL A GREAT DESIGN ..
Reviews.Author: peter christian
Reviews.Content: Replacement for a dear old dumb friend .Perfect for those days when all you need isa life line in your trousers without any bellsand whistles

Reviews.Title: Review of my Verizon Samsung Sway U650 Sllider Phone
Reviews.Author: Alina Novo
Reviews.Content: I liked it very much, it was also in very good condition...I used to have it before, but then one day the push on keys did not work.. I just want it, to receive and make calls. Something simple!Thank you!

Reviews.Title: 5 stars have a working phone what I needed.
Reviews.Author: Robert Wehrenberg
Reviews.Content: Got the phone very fast, first one was doa (the screen went crazy and couldn't receive calls), but sent another one promptly after contacting via email and I actually got the second phone before the expected ship date of the first one. Good customer service. I understand once in a while you may get a defective device, but it was handled very promptly and professionally and I am very pleased with the phone.

Reviews.Title: battery life is sucked
Reviews.Author: purple
Reviews.Content: The phone is thin, light, good price and easy to use.  but the battery is vile.  Wish battery will stay longer

Reviews.Title: Good price for what it does.
Reviews.Author: EmJay
Reviews.Content: Thin, light, and easy to use. Good for a short-term replacement phone and the price is decent. It's prone to scratches, I find.

Reviews.Title: Wouldn't recommend
Reviews.Author: Golf_lady0530
Reviews.Content: The shipping to me was quick.  I recieved the phone and it could make outgoing calls and it wasn't until the next day that I found out it does not recieve calls at all.  It has been almost a month since I shipped the phone back and I have yet to recieve my refund.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Sway U650
Reviews.Author: Beach Goer
Reviews.Content: The phone dose not work, cannot charge.  Brought it to Verizon for them to check it out, could not charge it either.  Will need to return all items purchased.

Reviews.Title: Leslie.
Reviews.Author: Leslie Acevedo
Reviews.Content: I like it but I 'm unable to access the web. As a result, I'm unable to pay my cellphone bill directly from my cellphone!
